formalpara.title: Figure 6. Structure of LAG-1 (CSL) bound to DNA.
formalpara.para: Ribbon diagram of CSL from C. elegans (PDB ID: 1TTU). The NTD, BTD, and CTD are colored cyan, green, and orange, respectively. A β-strand that bridges interactions with all three domains is colored magenta. The DNA is shown in a stick representation with carbon, oxygen, nitrogen, and phosphorous atoms colored yellow, red, blue, and orange, respectively.
